lines.text: It seems to me that the best relationships, the ones that last, are frequently the ones that are rooted in friendship. You know, one day you look at the person and you see something more than you did the night before. Like a switch has been flicked somewhere. And the person who was just a friend is suddenly the only person you can ever imagine yourself with.
You have seen this before, I can tell. You lied to them.
I would never lie. I willfully participated in a campaign of misinformation.

Scully, I was like you once. I didn't know who to trust. Then I... I chose another path... another life, another fate, where I found my sister. The end of my world was unrecognizable and upside down. There was one thing that remained the same. You were my friend, and you told me the truth. Even when the world was falling apart, you were my constant. My touchstone.
And you are mine.
You know, they say when you talk to God it's prayer, but when God talks to you, it's schizophrenia.
Trust no one.
Mulder, toads just fell from the sky!
I guess their parachutes didn't open.
Sorry, nobody down here but the FBI's most unwanted.
Agent Mulder? I'm Dana Scully. I've been assigned to work with you.
Oh, isn't it nice to be suddenly so highly regarded. So, who did you tick off to get stuck with this detail, Scully?
Actually, I'm looking forward to working with you. I've heard a lot about you.
Oh, really? I was under the impression that you were sent to spy on me.
I have a theory. Do you want to hear it?
Van Blundht somehow physically transformed into his captor and walked out the door, leaving no one the wiser?
Scully, should we be picking out china patterns or what?
You have to be willing to see.
I wish it were that simple.
Scully, you have to believe me. Nobody else on this whole damn planet does or ever will. You're my one in five billion.
Sure, fine, whatever.
And a lie, Mr. Mulder, is most convincingly hidden between two truths.
What is this?
This is where you pucker up and kiss my ass.
[entering Mulder's apartment]
Why is it so dark in here?
The lights aren't on.
Scully, you are the only one I trust.

[upon seeing the Cigarette Smoking Man in a hospital]
Please tell me you're here with severe chest pains.
I have never met anyone so passionate and dedicated to a belief as you. It's so intense that sometimes it's blinding.
I've often felt that dreams are answers to questions we haven't yet figured out how to ask.
Sometimes the only sane answer to an insane world is insanity.
Sometimes we must come full circle to find the truth. Why does that surprise you?
Mostly, it just makes me afraid.
Afraid?
Afraid that God is speaking... but that no one's listening.
If coincidences are coincidences, why do they feel so contrived?
No matter how paranoid you are, you're not paranoid enough.
We've both lost so much... but I believe that what we're looking for is in the X-Files. I'm more certain than ever that the truth is in there.
I've heard the truth, Mulder. Now what I want are the answers.
What if there was only one choice and all the other ones were wrong? And there were signs along the way to pay attention to.
Mmm. And all the choices would then lead to this very moment. One wrong turn, and we wouldn't be sitting here together. Well, that says a lot. That says a lot, a lot, a lot.
The truth will save you, Scully. I think it'll save both of us.
Last time you were so engrossed, it turned out you were reading the "Adult Video News."

[repeated closing phrase]
That will be all.
THE TRUTH IS OUT THERE
[repeated line]
Where is she?
APOLOGY IS POLICY
THIS PROGRAMME IS NOT MADE ON BEHALF OF, OR WITH THE APPROVAL OF, THE FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION
I'm afraid I can't help you.
Why?
The last time I helped you, I bloodied my fist and revealed my identity.
[repeated line]
But Mulder...
The Truth is out there, Mulder. But so are lies.
Do we have to watch this, Fox?
Leave it. I'm watching "The Magician" at nine.
Mom and Dad said I could watch some movie, Buttmunch.
They're next door at the Gallren's and they said I'm in charge.
Hey. Get out of my life.
I'm watching The Magician.
Now look. The fuse is blown.
Fox!
Samantha! Samantha!
You're gonna have to tell me who you are first!
TRUST NO-ONE
The voice tells me my sister is safe. It tells me everything will be okay.
Do you believe the voice?
I want to believe.
Oh no.
[holds up newspaper headline saying "Elvis Presley Dead At 42"]
GOVERNMENT DENIES KNOWLEDGE

[deciding who is going to shoot the Alien]
I'm the Liar, you're the Killer.
Your lies have killed more people than I ever could.
If I'm going to put my ass out there, I need to know if it's hanging by a thread.
[repeated line]
Mulder/Scully? Let me have a word with you.
There's nothing more dangerous than someone with nothing left to lose.
[the Alien heals Mulder's Mother]
What can I do about a Lie with an Official Seal on it?
[repeated line]
Stop or I'll shoot!
